meanings.definition: A substitute or replacement for something else.
meanings.sent1: When I ran out of milk, I used water as a succedaneum in my coffee.
meanings.sent2: In baking, applesauce can be a healthy succedaneum for oil.
meanings.sent3: For Halloween, my costume was a succedaneum for a famous movie character.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a succedaneum for the sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The student's drawing of a tree was a poor succedaneum for the real thing.
